changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "account_notification" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "kind" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, "level" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "message" TEXT NOT NULL, "metadata" JSONB NULL, "artifact_id" UUID NULL, "cluster_id" UUID NOT NULL, "account_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("artifact_id") REFERENCES "artifact" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("cluster_id") REFERENCES "cluster" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("account_id") REFERENCES "account" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE ); CREATE INDEX "idx_account_notification_cluster_id" ON "account_notification" ("cluster_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_account_notification_account_status_active" ON "account_notification" ("account_id", "status") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_account_notification_artifact_id" ON "account_notification" ("artifact_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "artifact_id" IS NOT NULL;
